name: Slidely AI
headline: AI-powered PowerPoint add-in to make beautiful presentations faster.
description: Slidely AI is a PowerPoint add-in that uses AI to design presentations and make them corporate-ready in seconds. Save up to 80% of time when formatting slides with Slidely.

founders.name: Apoorve Singhal, Founder
founders.description:
Apoorve is the co-founder and CEO of Tersho. 

He wrote the code for a self-driving car in his sophomore year that beat other teams of PhDs. He has deep AI research experience working with top scientists from Stanford, Adobe and Brown University.

During his time at IIT Kharagpur studying CS + AI, he made products like BookMySlot and Auto-OTP that were used by more than 10,000 users.

founders.name: Nikhil Shah, Founder
founders.description: Nikhil Shah is the co-founder and CTO of Tersho. He has a background in machine learning and computer vision, having worked with research labs at University of Oregon, CERN and Amazon Science. His research has been published at top-tier conferences and has been cited 100+ times. Nikhil likes to build tools that solve his own problems.

generated_description:
**Slidely AI: Transforming Presentations with AI**

Welcome to the future of slide presentations! Slidely AI, established in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2022 batch, is an innovative company based in Lewes, Delaware. With a tiny team of just two people, they’ve set out on a mission: to help you create beautiful, corporate-ready presentations faster using artificial intelligence. And let me tell you, they mean business.

The tool they offer is a PowerPoint add-in that has the potential to save users up to 80% of the time usually spent formatting slides. You simply click a button, and voila! Your presentations get transformed into visually appealing works of art, tailored for the business world. 

### What Makes Slidely AI Stand Out?

1. **AI-Driven Design**: Slidely AI’s recommendations engine takes the drudgery out of designing presentations. It makes your slides look polished with just one click.

2. **Speedy Formatting**: Who has the time to spend hours tweaking their slides? With Slidely AI, you can format them in seconds, letting you focus on what really matters—your message.

3. **Rich Template Library**: Users can search through a vast library of millions of templates, giving them access to designs that fit their specific needs.

4. **User-Friendly Command Bar**: Access all of Slidely’s features with a single command using CTRL+K, making it accessible to everyone, regardless of tech savviness.

5. **Reusability and Customization**: Users can easily save and anonymize previous presentations to use them as templates for future projects.

6. **Integrated Proofreading**: The tool not only enhances the aesthetics but also helps in maintaining consistency across your slides. Any mistakes? It catches them in a snap.

7. **Corporate Icons and Infographics**: Packed with thousands of suitable icons and infographics, Slidely AI is all you need for a professional look.

### Why It Matters

In today's fast-paced world, time is everything. Whether you’re pitching an idea, presenting data, or sharing insights, the last thing you want is to be bogged down by the minutiae of slide design. Slidely AI targets that pain point—offering a practical, efficient solution that’s backed by the credibility of Y Combinator.

Ultimately, Slidely AI exemplifies how technology can simplify complex tasks, making beautiful designs accessible with minimal effort. If you’re looking to step up your presentation game, it’s time to check out Slidely AI and transform your slides from drab to fab in seconds.

For more information, visit their website at [Slidely AI](https://slidely.ai/).
